list_feature: Designing a user-friendly interface for both farm staff and farmers
Designing a comprehensive system to manage import and export states and revenue statistics
A user-friendly registration process for farmers to create an account on the website
A comprehensive catalog of all kinds of pigs supplied by the farm, including detailed information about each breed, age, and price
An ordering system that enables farmers to purchase one or many piglets needed, with real-time updates on availability and delivery status
A communication channel between farmers and the farm for ensuring proper care of purchased piglets, including regular updates on feeding and vaccination procedures
Access to an information hub where farmers can learn about feeding and vaccination procedures, as well as any other relevant information necessary for caring for their purchased piglets
Advanced analytics capabilities to help farmers make informed decisions based on historical trends and real-time market insights
